[Groovy] Class BaseProvisioner

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.infrastructure.imgr.BaseComponent
      com.aestasit.infrastructure.imgr.provisioner.BaseProvisioner

@groovy.util.logging.Slf4j
abstract class BaseProvisioner
extends BaseComponent

This is base provisioner class that holds common functionality for all other provisioners.
